name: Version 2.3.1
body:
Contains progress enabled buttons, new wipes, and various fixes.

https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/milestone/18?closed=1

name: Version 2.3.0
body:
Contains new flip-able cards, badges, and other styles.

News/summary: http://materialdesigninxaml.net/news#2-3-0

Full release notes: https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/milestone/16?closed=1

name: Version 2.2.1
body: Patch release containing various fixes, as listed here: https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/milestone/17?closed=1

name: Version 2.2.0
body:
Featuring a new snackbar control, right, top and bottom drawers, and various fixes and style tweaks.

Full release notes: https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/milestone/15?closed=1

name: Version 2.1.0
body:
Improved Expander style, and various fixes. See full [change
 log](https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/milestone/12?closed=1).

![expander](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/658107/18004861/841ae33c-6b8e-11e6-95a3-290bb5fd720b.gif)

name: Version 2.0.0
body:
Please see the small list of [breaking changes](https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/wiki/Version-2.0.0---Breaking-Changes).

Includes new Chip control, toggle style listboxes, and a whole host of fixes and improvements.

[Release notes](https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/milestone/11?closed=1)

name: Version 1.5.0
body:
Introducing the Transitions API, with which you can build things such as this:

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MaterialDesignInXAML/F1InXAML/master/resources/main.gif)

There are transition demos in the main source/demo, and a brand new demo app [F1 in XAML](https://github.com/MaterialDesignInXAML/F1InXAML).  Check out the [wiki article](https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/wiki/Transitions) for a breakdown of the API/XAML usage.

[Full 1.5.0 change log](https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=milestone%3A%22ver+1.5.0%22+is%3Aclosed+).

name: Version 1.4.1
body:
Primarily a fixes release. Follow the link for full details.

https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/issues?q=milestone%3A%22ver+1.4.1%22+is%3Aclosed

name: Version 1.4.0
body:
The big new feature is the inclusion of the [Material Design Icons](https://materialdesignicons.com/) collection.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/658107/12392942/8e4cbb02-bdea-11e5-9f0e-56562d023218.png)

Full details of all fixes and enhancements can be found here:

https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/issues?q=milestone%3A%22ver+1.4%22+is%3Aclosed

name: Version 1.3.2
body:
Various fixes; primarily from the community: thank you!

Details at: https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=milestone%3A%22ver+1.3.2%22+

name: Version 1.3
body:
Features of note:
- Multi Action/Popup Button
- Context Menu Theme
- Hyperlink Style

And various other fixes and improvements; full details here:  https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=milestone%3A%22ver+1.3%22+is%3Aclosed+

For the first time the compiled demo is attached as part of this release.

The .Net 4.0 branch is no longer actively maintained, the community is welcome to update it and raise a PR.

name: Version 1.2
body:
Details: 
- https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/issues?q=milestone%3A%22ver+1.2%22+is%3Aclosed

Of note:
- ComboBox styling
- TimePicker goes 24 hour
- Additional Slider theme
- DialogHost improvements

name: Version 1.1
body:
Treeview styling, modal dialogs, drawers, better animations all around, simpler configuration and several bug fixes.

All  issues and PRs: https://github.com/ButchersBoy/MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit/issues?q=milestone%3A%22ver+1.1%22
